sentences.en: A fence marked the perimeter of the field.
sentences.cn: 一道篱笆标明了那块田地的周界.

sentences.en: By night, the perimeter wire was illumined by lights.
sentences.cn: 到了夜里，周遭的铁丝网都被灯光照亮。

sentences.en: Calculate the perimeter of the rectangle.
sentences.cn: 计算这个长方形的周长。

sentences.en: Drinks in hands, they wandered around the perimeter of the ball field.
sentences.cn: 他们手里拿着饮料在球场周围漫不经心地遛跶.

sentences.en: Guards had been posted at several points around the perimeter.
sentences.cn: 在环形防线上已布置了几处岗哨.

sentences.en: Guards patrol the perimeter of the estate.
sentences.cn: 保安人员在庄园四周巡逻。

sentences.en: Guards patrol the perimeter of the estate.
sentences.cn: 保安人员在庄园四周巡逻。

sentences.en: How am I to find the perimeter in the dark?
sentences.cn: 我在黑暗里怎么看出周围的警戒线 呢 ?

sentences.en: Officers dressed in riot gear are surrounding the perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 身穿防暴服的警察正在包围外围的栅栏。

sentences.en: Some 300 trees have been ranged along the perimeter hedge.
sentences.cn: 沿着绿篱栽种着大约300棵树。

sentences.en: Staff withdrew from the main part of the prison but secured the perimeter.
sentences.cn: 工作人员从监狱的主要区域撤出，但外围仍派人守卫。

sentences.en: The barbed wire fence round the perimeter discouraged intruders.
sentences.cn: 周围有铁丝网阻止了外人闯入.

sentences.en: The plane veered off the runway and careered through the perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 飞机突然偏离跑道，高速冲过了周围的护栏。

sentences.en: The river marks the eastern perimeter of our land.
sentences.cn: 这条河标示我们的土地东面的边界.

sentences.en: The two men broke out of their cells and cut through a perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 这两个人逃出牢房，并越过了围墙。

sentences.en: They ended up ripping down perimeter fencing and tussling with the security staff.
sentences.cn: 最终他们拆毁了四周的围栏，与保安人员厮打起来。
